properties.entry:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, M.* FROM( SELECT MEMBER_NO , LOCATION_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_ALIAS , EMAIL , GENDER , AGE , ENROLL_DATE , REPORT_COUNT , STATUS , PF_STATUS FROM MEMBER ) M
) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT b.*, m.member_id, m.member_name, m.member_name FROM Board b JOIN Member m ON b.member_no = m.member_no;
SELECT R.* FROM REPORT_DETAIL R JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO
SELECT B.MEMBER_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_STATUS, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO
